thumb.title: [TAS] GBC Pokémon: Crystal Version "arbitrary code execution" by CasualPokePlayer in 05:49.79
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JwMLHqC761M CasualPokePlayer ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/CasualPokePlayer )以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6487M TAS originally published on 2025-04-15The Pokémon games for the Game Boy and the Game Boy Color are known for having quite a lot of exploitable glitches ( https://glitchcity.wiki/wiki/Category... ). The quickest way of beating the game with these exploits is by corrupting the save data ( https://tasvideos.org/6237M ), but there are also many other ways of beating the games without having to mess with the save data. And with such exploitable games comes opportunities to execute arbitrary code and have them do completely different things ( https://tasvideos.org/3358M ).説明文が長いので転載元を見てください
thumb.last_res_body: 技術的なことはよ... UDKかな？ 即バグってた ←3和音＋ノイズで... ↑TASVIDEOS読んで... ザ・エンド ってね 流石に...
